name: Monsters Attack
description: Hordes of Monsters have taken over the world. Your mission is simple, destroy all monsters and save the planet! But make sure you do it in style while listening to groovy tunes.Kill them all and survive.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 2 Duo or higher Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 1 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: Core 4 Duo or higher Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX11 Compatible GPU with 2 GB Video RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1500 MB available space Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
